about.title: About me
about.body: I'm a DevOps engineer in Chile with experience working for U.S. banking and enterprise clients. I focus on CI/CD, automation with Python, and cloud environments (mainly AWS).

skills.title: Key skills
skills.item1: CI/CD with Jenkins, Tekton, GitHub Actions, AWS CodePipeline and CodeBuild.
skills.item2: AWS infrastructure (Lambda, S3, CloudFront, ECS/EKS, networking, IAM basics).
skills.item3: Automation with Python and Bash for build, deploy, and housekeeping tasks.
skills.item4: Containers with Docker and deployments to Kubernetes/OpenShift.

projects.title: Projects
projects.platformBody: Design and automation of pipelines from development to production, including static code analysis, Docker image build, and automated deployments to Kubernetes/OpenShift.
projects.serverlessBody: Implementation of pipelines for AWS Lambda functions with automated tests and branch-based deployments, reducing lead time and manual errors in releases.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: This portfolio is deployed using AWS serverless and CI/CD. Below you can see how the pieces fit together.

cicd.title: CI/CD Demo (this site)
cicd.body1: This portfolio is deployed as a static site in S3, fronted by CloudFront and a custom domain managed in Route 53.
cicd.body2: A CodePipeline pipeline pulls changes from GitHub, runs a CodeBuild project, and syncs the site to the S3 bucket.
cicd.body3: For demo purposes, I can use this pipeline to introduce small visual changes (for example, theme or layout tweaks) on each deployment and track them in Git.
